alert.note: Alert for Craighead; Greene (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 25 at 8:25AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Greene, central Craighead and southwestern Dunklin Counties through 900 AM CDT... At 825 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Jonesboro, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, Paragould, Lake City, Bay, Brookland, Oak Grove Heights, Cardwell, Hergett, Apt, Valley View, Schug, Gum Point, Bard, Farrville, Lester, Halliday, Cary, Bethel, Finch and Noxburn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
